DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical research study is determine if patients with diabetes that have undergone previous opening of a heart blockage may have a blockage that is not causing any symptoms that may be detected by imaging with Cardiolite.
DOC.brief_title: Post-PCI:Cardiac Imaging in Patients With Diabetes to Detect Coronary Artery Blockages Previously Opened by Angioplasty
DOC.criteria: Type II Diabetes on medication & angioplasty within the past 6 months. Myocardial infarction or repeat angioplasty with the past 5 months. Unable to perform exercise or pharmacologic stress test.
